name: Pixel Drifters
description:
*** Featured Worldwide as a Must-Play Game by Apple ***
*** #1 Racing Game in over 25 Countries ***

*** "Visually, Pixel Drifters is one of the strongest pixel art games of 2017. While clearly nostalgic for the heyday of the SNES, its retro sensibility comes across more as true homage than gimmick" - Gamezebo ***

*** "Pixel Drifters has got off to a strong start in the metaphorical race that is the App Store" - Touch Arcade ***

Get in the driver's seat and drift your way around a variety of obstacles and tight corners. Collect coins, earn combos, complete missions, and unlock the entire fleet of Pixel Drifters!

FEATURES
◉ Adrenaline pumping, endless drifting action
◉ 36 different vehicles to collect
◉ Different steering, drifting and speed capabilities per vehicle
◉ Dozens of missions to complete
◉ Record, play and share your drifting skills
◉ Handcrafted drift arenas
◉ Trains, gates, mills and many other obstacles
